title: Chaco Culture National Historical Park: Educational Fee Waiver
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Parks as Classrooms     Field Trips     Educational Fee Waiver                  Educational Fee Waiver         School visit to Chaco NPS Photo  If you represent an academic institution, you may be eligible for a waiver of entrance fees for the adults over 15 years in your group (children 15 and under are free). Download this Word document to apply for an academic fee waiver (pdf version- 91kb).
